<<<<<<< HEAD
The fierie tryall of Gods saints as a counter-poyze to I.W. priest his English Martyrologie. And the detestable ends of popish traytors. ...
[8], 40, [24], 10
Printed by T. P[urfoot] [and T. Creed] for Arthur Iohnson, At London : 1611.
Printers' names from STC. "The fierie tryall of Gods saints" and "The detestable ends of popish traytors" each have separate title pages. Appended, with caption title: A post-script to the wel affected reader. Answers STC 25771: Wilson, John. The English martyrologe. Considerable print show-through. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
